thread.title: FOX 8 nominated for 8 Suncoast Regional Emmys
thread.title_full: FOX 8 nominated for 8 Suncoast Regional Emmys - FOX 8 WVUE New Orleans News, Weather, Sports, Social

author: Written by: FOX8Live.com Staff
title: FOX 8 nominated for 8 Suncoast Regional Emmys
text:
NEW ORLEANS (WVUE) - FOX 8 has been nominated for eight Suncoast Regional Emmys, including one for Overall Station Excellence.
The nominations include:
Overall Excellence – “WVUE” – Sandy Breland, Tim Ingram Investigative Report – “Downfall of a Dynasty” – Lee Zurik and Nola.com/The Times Picayune’s Heather Nolan Journalistic Enterprise – “Holding Officials Accountable” – Lee Zurik Historical/Cultural – “Heart of Louisiana” – Dave McNamara Documentary/Historical – “Miracle on the Mississippi – The Battle of New Orleans” – Dave McNamara In the Craft Categories, FOX 8 Morning Edition anchor Greg Adaline was nominated for “Writing” and Chief Investigative Reporter Lee Zurik was nominated twice for “On Camera Talent/Investigative.”
The winners will be announced Dec. 5.
